Review_title: Great picture of the boy band timeline
Review_Text: SpoilerThe documentary tells the story of the evolution of the boy bands, from the US perspective. From the British Invasion, going through the Jackson 5 / The Osmonds 70's moment to the early 80s New Edition to the late 80s with New Kids on the Block (both from Boston)Then, the Orlando boy bands, Backstreet Boys and NSYNC. They lack talking more about british boy bands from this era such as Take That and Westlife.The timeline follows to the finish with Hanson, One Direction, Jonas Brothers and K-pop.Honorable mentions to The Monkees, Menudo, Wham!, 98 Degrees and Justin Bieber.The solo efforts from band members are also highlited: Michael Jackson, Donny Osmond, Geroge Michael, Justin Timberlake and Harry Styles.
